name: Your Own Fabric Eiderdown
description:
If you would rather use the fabric of your dreams to make your perfect eiderdown the guide below shows you how much fabric you will need to send me.

Quantity if using the same fabric for top & bottom:
Single  4.5m
Double 9.0m
King     9.5m
   
Quantity if using different fabric for top & bottom:
Single  top 2.5m - bottom 2.0m
Double top 5.0m - bottom 4.0m
King     top 5.5m - bottom 4.0m

Fabrics that are not suitable are sheer, stretch fabric but please bear in mind that linens and heavier weight fabrics will make a heavier quilt with less loft,
  
Please contact me for more advice if you are in doubt.

You can see a few of the eiderdowns created for customers in the past.

Please allow 28 days for delivery and a little longer for overseas.

name: GUARANTEED PRE CHRISTMAS ORDERS
description: I am so sorry but due to unprecedented demand for eiderdowns I will not be able to guarantee orders taken after the 10th of November to be ready in time for Christmas, this will NOT effect  eiderdowns that are in stock!!

name: Gorgeous Vanilla Dupion Pure Silk Eiderdown
description:
Vintage inspired 100% pure silk eiderdown. Cambric lined and double stitched so you won't loose the feather & down filling!
 
The dupion silk is a lovely vanilla with the palest cream cotton underside and all finished off with a piped edge. 
 
 
A beautifully plump and cosy quilt which will last you for many years to come!

The eiderdown shown here is a double size and measures 60 ins x 67 ins (152 cm x 170 cm) 

 Other sizes are available but please allow up to 28 days for delivery as your eiderdown will need to be specially made for you!
UK mainland P&P £10 fully tracked.  UK highlands, islands, Northern Ireland and international buyers, please contact for a shipping quote.

description:

This gorgeous eiderdown has the sweetest pink roses and foxgloves on a soft duck egg bluey green ground, the fabric on the underside is the same and all finished off with a piped edge.

name: Dartmoor Heather Hand Woven Tweed Eiderdown
description:
Beautiful  hand woven tweed which is made on a 70 year old loom only 6 miles away! Sadly the tweed is only made in 10 metre lengths so I won't be able to make another quilt in a larger size or in this colour again. 

The colours are fabulous,the same colours as the Dartmoor heather on a cloudy day,

The reverse is a gorgeously rich purple to match the deeper purples in the top of the quilt.

Filled with feather & down,cambric lined and all finished off with a piped edge!

A beautifully plump and cosy quilt which will last you for many years to come!

The eiderdown shown here is a single size and measures 116 cms x 170 cms. This pretty single eiderdown is a generous size and would look great length wise at the foot of a double or king size bed! 
This single is in stock and available for immediate dispatch!

UK mainland P&P £10 fully tracked. UK highlands, islands, Northern Ireland and international buyers, please contact for a shipping quote.

name: Sweet Briar Rose & Green Spot Eiderdown
description:
Vintage inspired 100% natural cotton and feather eiderdown. Cambric lined and double stitched so you won't loose feathers!

The fabric ground is lovely soft cream with the most gorgeous little briar roses and sweet peas in 100% cotton. This fabric design dates from around 30s - 40s I have seen this pattern on very old and tatty eiderdowns and now some bright spark has replicated it in cotton with the weave and rustic look of linen but without the creasing, how could I resist turning it into a brand,spanking new eiderdown? 
The fabric on the reverse is a gorgeous spotty soft sage green and all finished off with a piped edge! 
The eiderdown shown is a king size but if you wish you can have it made into a  single,double or king size but please allow 21 days for dispatch as it will be especially made for you! 
 
If you would like a swatch of this or any of the fabrics I use then just email me the address of where you would like it sent and I'll pop it in the post! 
A beautifully plump and cosy quilt which will last for many years!

The eiderdown shown here is a king size and measures 65 ins long x 65 ins wide (165cm x 165cm),

name: Sweet Briar Rose & Green Spot Child/Mini Size Eiderdown
description:
Vintage inspired 100% natural cotton and feather eiderdown. Cambric lined and double stitched so you won't loose feathers!

The fabric ground is lovely soft cream with the most gorgeous little briar roses and sweet peas in 100% cotton. This fabric design dates from around 30s - 40s I have seen this pattern on very old and tatty eiderdowns and now some bright spark has replicated it in cotton with the weave and rustic look of linen but without the creasing, how could I resist turning it into a brand,spanking new eiderdown? 
The fabric on the reverse is a gorgeous spotty soft sage green.  
The eiderdown shown here is a child size but would be equally useful as a lap quilt, just perfect for those chilly evenings when it's not cold enough for the fire to be lit but you just need something extra when curled up with a good book. 
This darling little eiderdown is in stock and ready to go and measures 48 ins x 35 1/2 ins.(122 cms x 90 cms) 
If you would like a swatch of this or any of the fabrics I use then just email me the address of where you would like it sent and I'll pop it in the post! 
A beautifully plump and cosy quilt which will last for many years!
